_meta.description: MINIMAL CHART - 2-3 bars only for maximum visual impact
_meta.outputPath: Renders to same directory as input JSON
_meta.strategy: Fewer bars = larger bars = more dramatic. Perfect for before/after, A vs B
_meta.bestFor: Opening hooks, key statistics, simple binary comparisons, dramatic reveals

_chartType_desc: Chart type: 'bar' for vertical bar chart

dimensions._desc: 1080x1080 square - bars will be LARGE with only 2-3 items

margin._desc: Larger margins since bars are fewer and bigger

background._color_desc: Near-black for drama. Use '#00FF00' for green screen

title._text_desc: Keep VERY short - this is about impact

subtitle._show_desc: Often skip subtitle for cleaner minimal look

font._size_desc: Large labels match the minimal aesthetic

gridLines._show_desc: No grid lines for minimal aesthetic

bars._gap_desc: Large gap between the few bars
bars._defaultColor_desc: Muted default - highlight the 'after' with gold

animation._desc: Staggered animation for dramatic beforeâ†’after reveal
animation._style_desc: 'staggered' builds anticipation between Before and After
animation._velocityMode_desc: true = After bar (if taller) takes longer - dramatic!
